title: Tier1 is currently looking for dedicated management!
body:
Hello my fellow LoL community. Tier1 is currently looking for management in the following roles:

Chief commercial officer - The Chief Commercial Officer (CCO) is an executive-level role, with the holder being responsible for the commercial strategy and the development of an organization. It typically involves activities relating to marketing, sales, product development and customer service to drive business growth and market share.

Social Media Manager - Speaks for itself. Looking after all the social media and website when it finishes its development.

LoL team Manager - Looking after the players and making sure the players that are in there are commiting. You also will be setting up events for them to participate in.

CS:GO Team Manager - Looking after the players and making sure the players that are in there are commiting. You also will be setting up events for them to participate in.

The requirements to be eligible to trial are as follows:


- 18+ 
- Experience in Management 
- Good Communication 
- Willing to commit to the organisation
- Willing to stick to the organisation for the long run 
- No ragers 
- Willing to have fun and make an impact in the community 

If you meet these requirements please fill out the form below: 

Personal Information -

Tier1 recently entered CGA for CS:GO and just picked up a LoL Team. We are looking for dedicated staff to further the organisation into succes. Any questions regarding what you will be offered will be explained during your trial period.

Thank you for your time any inquiries please don't hesitate to contact us here at: tier1australia@gmail.com
